name: Gourav Gunjan
summary: A results-driven Staff Frontend Engineer and Architect with over 12 years of experience designing, building, and leading the development of large-scale, mission-critical applications. Proven expertise in architecting complex UI systems, modernizing legacy codebases, and mentoring high-performing engineering teams. Passionate about driving innovation and delivering solutions that yield significant business impact, such as reducing developer onboarding time by 80%, decreasing application load times from minutes to seconds, and supporting financial systems managing over $2 trillion in monthly transactions.

competencies.skills: Scalable Frontend Architectures, Design Systems, Micro-Frontends, Performance Optimization
Team Leadership (30+ engineers), Code Reviews, Best Practices, Intern Mentorship
JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular (4-12+), HTML5, CSS3/SCSS, RxJS, NgRx, WebSockets
Angular Material, Ag-Grid, D3.js, Highcharts.js, Node.js, Electron
Java, C#, Hazelcast, SQL, MongoDB, Firebase
Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Azure, CI/CD, Agile Methodologies

experience.description: As the UI technical lead for Workspace Platform Security, I spearhead the architectural strategy, development, and mentorship for critical user-facing security applications, informally guiding UI projects for over 30 engineers.
achievements: Architected and led the development of the "Security Advisor" frontend using Boq Wiz, a zero-bug UI tool that upgraded security capabilities for over 65,000 customer seats through collaboration with 5+ cross-functional teams.
Re-architected the legacy Security Investigation Tool (SIT) onboarding platform, leading to an 80% reduction in time-to-onboard and a 50% reduction in code required for over 30 partner teams.

Authored the comprehensive technical design for modernizing SIT, proposing a new, extensible architecture that decouples components and simplifies future development, reducing the time to add new features from weeks to days.
Mentored 10 interns (3 direct, 7 indirect) who all successfully converted to full-time Software Engineers.
Consistently recognized for impact and leadership with multiple performance awards, spot bonuses, and peer bonuses.

experience.description: Served as the UI Team Lead for a team of 3 developers on VMware Aria Operations for Logs, a high-scale log analytics platform.
achievements: Led the successful framework migration of a 100,000+ LOC enterprise application from Angular 8 to Angular 12, improving performance and maintainability.
Architected and implemented a dynamic, scalable theming system, including a full dark mode, by creating a new color palette and SASS mixin library, significantly enhancing user experience.

experience.description: Functioned as the UI Architect and Technical Lead for a team of 5 developers, delivering applications for a fund management division handling over $2 trillion in monthly transactions.
achievements: Engineered a distributed caching infrastructure using Java and Hazelcast, slashing application load times from over 2 minutes to under 2 seconds.
Developed a real-time data update framework using WebSockets, enabling a 40+ member fund management team to manage client information with live data, significantly improving operational efficiency.
Led the end-to-end design and delivery of 5 mission-critical workflow management applications, enabling internal users to manage complex financial operations efficiently.

experience.description: Developed software for advanced CT scanners and innovated new clinical workflow solutions.
achievements: Pioneered and developed three novel proof-of-concept products by identifying critical clinician pain points during on-site hospital visits. These innovations included a voice-controlled scanner operation system, a gesture-based image manipulation tool, and an augmented reality viewer for precise biopsy guidance.

projects.name: Restaurant Management System
projects.description: Independently architected and developed a proprietary, enterprise-grade restaurant management application (>100k LOC). The system provides end-to-end functionality including billing, inventory management, staff scheduling, and advanced reporting/insights.

projects.name: The Angular Coder
projects.description: Creator of a YouTube channel dedicated to teaching advanced concepts in Angular and TypeScript to the developer community.
